questions.text: What is the difference between Synchronous and Asynchronous RS flip-flops?

questions.text: Which of the following statements is true about interrupt handling in a multitasking environment?

choices.text: Interrupts should be disabled while a task is executing
Interrupts should be enabled while a task is executing
Interrupts should be prioritized based on the task being executed
Interrupts should be ignored in a multitasking environment

Bitwise AND operators are written in uppercase, while bitwise OR operators are not
Bitwise OR operators are written in uppercase, while bitwise AND operators are not

questions.text: What is the purpose of the fclose() function in C?

choices.text: To close a file that was opened for reading

A firewall that filters traffic at the application layer.
A firewall that acts as an intermediary between internal hosts and external networks, filtering and forwarding traffic as necessary.
